JACT Auditions

JACT auditions will be held Saturday, May 13, 2017.

Everyone auditioning for a musical should prepare 16 bars of any song and provide an accompaniment CD or tape, or provide their own accompanist.

Plays are performed at 11:00 AM for one week: Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday, and two shows on Friday, 11:00am and a 7:00pm show.
Rehearsals generally begin five weeks prior to opening date. Most rehearsals are scheduled for daytime. Please complete the on line audition application and email to tstew@applehillplayhouse.org You will have an opportunity to select an audition time preference.
